name: Beach Water Surfer Bike Racing - Motorbike Riding
name_original: Beach Water Surfer Bike Racing - Motorbike Riding
description:
Do you love driving water Bike games on beach and oceans? Are floating water surfer Bike racing and boating is a fun and thrill for you? If yes then get ready for Beach Water Surfer Bike Racing adventure on city town beach where you transform your motorbike into floating jet sky boats. As a best water surfing driver race your motorcycle in immense sea with fast speed to beat all jet motorbike surfers. This ultimate beach surfing game is best for real water boat lovers who got some amazing boat driving stunts on water simulation. In bike racing challenge as a boy rider get ready for motorbike ride on beach. While jet boat racing perform crazy stunts in sea by jumping through circles. As a beach racer use your water bike surfing skills to prove yourself as a King of spring racing.

Take control of dirt motorbike to experience real water surfing bike race challenge. On this challenging and dangerous ocean your mission is to win the racing levels by beating all beach surfing motorbike riders. As a bike rider you can drive your bike on the beach as well as on the sea by transforming bike into jet sky like boat. The tyres of bike get transformed into floating tyre once you jump into ocean.

In Free mode ride your surfing bike with full speed to collect the check points on the beach sand. To unlock new wonderful luxurious motorbikes you have to win the bay race by driving floating motorbike through all checkpoints. Become the legend of beach racing by doing stunts and jumps with extreme modern motorbikes! Enjoy ocean rides with Beach Water Surfer Bike Racing.

How to Play:

- Hold the acceleration button to speed up the bike
- Tap the brake button to reduce the speed
- Press the hand break to stop the motorbikes
- Press the nitro to give the speed boost to your motorcycle
- Tap the left arrow button to turn left
- Tap the right button to turn right

Beach Water Surfer Bike Racing Features:

- It's Free with no internet connection required
- Futuristic floating bikes for Atv rider
- Underwater dirt bike driving simulation
- Realistic beach and jet ski stunt bike animations
- Realistic and dynamic motorbike physics
- Modern beach stunts and surfing racing simulation
- Racing And Time Challenge modes
